Info.Label: Info
Info.Tooltip: Information about the current and available automation

Configuration.Label: Configuration
Configuration.Tooltip: Configure available parts of the automation

sound.Label: Sound:
sound.Tooltip: Add a sound to be played

Medkit.NoPermission: You do not have permissions to change this

gmID.name: Gamemaster User ID
gmID.hint: The Gamemaster ID used for sockets. Automatically set.

hideNames.name: Hide Names
hideNames.hint: Should enemy names be hidden in dialogs.

effectInterface.name: Enable Effect Interface
effectInterface.hint: Adds a sidebar tab for Active Effects. Reload required after enabling.

macroInterface.name: Enable Macro Interface
macroInterface.hint: Adds a sidebar tab for Macros. Reload required after enabling.

temporaryEffectHud.name: Temporary Effects HUD
temporaryEffectHud.hint: Adds Temporary effects to the status effect token HUD.

additionalCompendiums.name: Additional Compendiums
additionalCompendiums.hint: Select additional item compendiums to be used by the medkit and adjust their priority.

conditionResistanceAndVulnerability.name: Condition Resistance and Vulnerability
conditionResistanceAndVulnerability.hint: Enables condition resistance and vulnerability automation.

useLocalCompendiums.name: Use Local Compendiums
useLocalCompendiums.hint: Use the local world compendiums instead of the module compendiums for item lookup.

UpdateItem.name: Medkit Update Automation Permissions
UpdateItem.hint: Lowest user ranking that can update the currently selected automation in the Medkit:

AutomateItem.name: Medkit Apply Automation Permissions
AutomateItem.hint: Lowest user ranking that can select and apply different automations in the Medkit:

ConfigureItem.name: Medkit Configuration Permissions
ConfigureItem.hint: Lowest user ranking that can configure automations in the Medkit:

HomebrewItem.name: Medkit Configure Homebrew Permissions
HomebrewItem.hint: Lowest user ranking that can configure homebrew customizations in the Medkit:

colorizeBuildABonus.name: Build A Bonus: Colorize Titlebar Icon
colorizeBuildABonus.hint: When enabled, the Build A Bonus titlebar icon will be recolored if a bonus is on the item or effect.

babonusOverlappingEffects.name: Build A Bonus: Overlapping Spell Effects
babonusOverlappingEffects.hint: When enabled, Build A Bonus aura bonuses will respect the overlapping spell effect and combining game effects rules.

colorizeDAE.name: Dynamic Active Effects: Colorize Titlebar Icon
colorizeDAE.hint: When enabled, the DAE titlebar icon will be recolored if an effect is on the item.

movement.unableToBeMoved: Target is unable to be moved!

effectInterface.item: This item is used for data storage for the CPR Effect Interface. Deleting this item will result in your stored active effects being deleted!
